featured.text: His father, __(19)__ always hoped that he would get a PhD and become a professor, __(20)__ with a scoff: “What is all this nonsense?!”

definition.zh_def: 博士學位，通常是學術界的最高學位，代表在某一學科領域的深入研究和專業知識。
definition.en_def: A Doctor of Philosophy degree, typically the highest academic degree awarded, representing advanced research and expertise in a specific field.
definition.example: She earned her PhD in biology after years of dedicated research.
